scripts.start: NODE_PATH=dist/ NODE_ENV=production DOTENV_FLOW_PATH=../ node -r module-alias/register -r dotenv-flow/config dist/index.js
scripts.start:dev: LOG_LEVEL=debug NODE_ENV=development DOTENV_FLOW_PATH=../ nodemon --watch ./src --ext ts -- --files -r dotenv-flow/config -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts
scripts.start:test: NODE_ENV=mock DOTENV_FLOW_PATH=../ nodemon --watch ./src --ext ts -- --files -r dotenv-flow/config -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts
scripts.start:mock: NODE_PATH=dist/ NODE_ENV=mock DOTENV_FLOW_PATH=../ MOCK_AUTH_PORT=30658 MOCK_GRPC_PORT=30650 nodemon --watch ./src --ext ts -- --files -r dotenv-flow/config -r tsconfig-paths/register src/mock/index.ts
scripts.mock-and-start: NODE_ENV=mock npm run start:test & NODE_ENV=mock npm run start:mock
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test GRAPHQL_PORT=0 LOG_LEVEL=none npx dotenv-flow -p ../ -- npx jest --config jest.config.js --max-workers=6 --selectProjects test
